name: Fam <3
greetingText: I really like to give you guys return gift !
wishText:
May our friendship never end:
 Audiophile,lily,Alpienliebe,Devil,Noah,winterr,jj,Aster,Seva,sunny,aman,sita,ved,fayah,lucifer,LOGIC,ezel,silky,dawn and many more ;)
text1: Today was my birthday and so many people wished me !!! :D
textInChatBox: Thank you for the wishes blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Thank you so much for the birthday wishes! I really appreciate it. Your kind words made my day even more special.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
